com.twitter.elephantbird.pig.load
Class LzoBaseLoadFunc

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.pig.LoadFunc
      com.twitter.elephantbird.pig.load.LzoBaseLoadFunc
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.pig.LoadMetadata
Direct Known Subclasses:
LzoBaseRegexLoader, LzoJsonLoader, LzoProtobufB64LinePigLoader, LzoProtobufBlockPigLoader, LzoThriftB64LinePigLoader, LzoThriftBlockPigLoader, LzoW3CLogLoader
public abstract class LzoBaseLoadFunc
extends org.apache.pig.LoadFunc
implements org.apache.pig.LoadMetadata

This class handles LZO-decoding and slicing input LZO files. It expects the filenames to end in .lzo, otherwise it assumes they are not compressed and skips them. TODO: Improve the logic to accept a mixture of lzo and non-lzo files.

Method Detail

incrCounter

protected void incrCounter(java.lang.String group,
                           java.lang.String counter,
                           long incr)
A convenience function for working with Hadoop counter objects from load functions. The Hadoop reporter object isn't always set up at first, so this class provides brief buffering to ensure that counters are always recorded.

incrCounter

protected void incrCounter(java.lang.Enum<?> key,
                           long incr)
A convenience function for working with Hadoop counter objects from load functions. The Hadoop reporter object isn't always set up at first, so this class provides brief buffering to ensure that counters are always recorded.
